body: At 6th level, as a free action, you may use natural and manufactured weapons in water as if you had continuous freedom of movement. As a standard action, you can throw a weapon underwater without the normal penalties for throwing weapons; if your target is in or under the water, the weapon also acts as a returning weapon (see page 471 of the Core Rulebook) for that attack.
name: Seastrike
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Druid/Animal and Terrain Domains/Aquatic Domain/Seastrike
